Sleeper players library

Source: R/sleeper_players.R
sleeper_players.Rd

A cached table of Sleeper NFL players. Will store in memory for each session! (via memoise in zzz.R)

sleeper_players()

Value

a dataframe containing all ~7000+ players in the Sleeper database

Examples

# \donttest{
try({ # try only shown here because sometimes CRAN checks are weird
  x <- sleeper_players()
  dplyr::sample_n(x, 5)
}) # end try
#> # A tibble: 5 × 34
#>   player_id player_name   pos     age team  status years_exp espn_id rotowire_id
#>   <chr>     <chr>         <chr> <dbl> <chr> <chr>      <int>   <int>       <int>
#> 1 7979      Ryan Neuzil   OL     24.3 ATL   Active         0      NA          NA
#> 2 5550      J.D. Moore    RB     26.4 NA    Inact…         2 3042728       13177
#> 3 4852      Bill Lazor    NA     NA   NA    Inact…         0      NA          NA
#> 4 4723      Justin Thomas WR     27.7 NA    Inact…         3 2971471       12254
#> 5 5539      Derrick Will… WR     27.1 CLE   Inact…         3 3040137       13138
#> # … with 25 more variables: yahoo_id <int>, sportradar_id <chr>,
#> #   fantasy_data_id <int>, rotoworld_id <int>, gsis_id <chr>, swish_id <int>,
#> #   stats_id <int>, hashtag <chr>, weight <chr>, birth_date <date>,
#> #   fantasy_positions <chr>, number <int>, active <lgl>, height <chr>,
#> #   college <chr>, sport <chr>, injury_status <chr>, news_updated <dbl>,
#> #   depth_chart_position <chr>, high_school <chr>, depth_chart_order <int>,
#> #   injury_notes <chr>, injury_body_part <chr>, practice_description <chr>, …
# }
